ComicInfo.Title: No. 406: Herniated Nose?; Citizen Caine; The Key of 'D' for Death; Fugue for Freebase; Fear of Frying; Freebase; Shoot the Girl; The Delivery Man; Proletarian Toot Funnies; An Artist is only as Good as His Research; Nosework; Cocaine Train
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-22 08:28:08. [CVDB77706] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 17:09:47. [Issue ID 97417]
ComicInfo.Characters: Kyoto,Reverend Tootie,Ratskello,Nekko,Space Dog,Wanda R. Willin,Citizen Caine,Sam Spoon,Razberry Tart,Wildroot,Grabbit,Pointer
ComicInfo.Summary:
No. 406: Herniated Nose?: Fake advertisement for a nose truss.
Citizen Caine: Wildroot makes a rich friend and is made a strange offer.
The Key of 'D' for Death: Sam gets a new career.
Fugue for Freebase: Bob talks about his lifestyle.
Fear of Frying: Stories of spontaneous combustion.
Freebase: The perils of cocaine.
Shoot the Girl: Grabbit talks about shooting drugs to a confused Ratskello.
The Delivery Man: The hardships of delivering cocaine in a fantasy world.
Proletarian Toot Funnies: How a builder gets turned on to cocaine.
An Artist is only as Good as His Research: Pointer determines to refine his art.
Nosework: The story of a dealer.
Cocaine Train: Space Dog's ship is stopped by the police.
